text: @WhiteHouse The lies that keep coming out of Trump's mouth is not only ridiculous but it's deadly. Not everyone can be tested, the WHO warned him EARLY, but he ignored it, he is the reason why the Kavita Center and USNS Comfort didn't initially take COVID-19 patients. The list goes on and on
